* [материалы занятия](https://agricolamz.github.io/2018_FE_R_statistics/correlation_regressions.pdf)
* [домашнее задание](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSctIDQQBsIGTMjkzuGiAEXVcE9N9EBPrKjkgyuUheVKHewvVQ/viewform)

Календарь можно скачать [в формате `.csv`](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agricolamz/2018_FE_R_statistics/master/timetable.csv) и импортировать в Google Calendar, MS Outlook и т. п.

```{r, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(timevis)
df <- read_csv("timetable.csv")
df %>% 
  mutate(`Start Date` = dmy(`Start Date`),
         id = 1:n(),
         Subject = paste0(
           "<a href = 'https://agricolamz.github.io/2018_FE_R_statistics/",
           gsub(" ", "_",Subject),
           ".html'>",
           Subject,
           "</a> <br>",
           wday(`Start Date`, label = TRUE),
           " ",
           day(`Start Date`),
           ".",
           month(`Start Date`))
         ) %>% 
  select("start" = "Start Date", "content" = "Subject") %>% 
  timevis()
```
